hard: A weak early stage of the fight – Lilith can be unkillable if you allow her to stack her violet skill. Use a high damage team (Keira blender, full damage karkh team, etc) with armor penetration and kill her at the beginning of the fight.

Qing Mao – Deals percentage of Lilith’s remaining health. Can come in handy once Lilith gets a high health pool. Also, Qing Mao provides armor penetration to make it easier for physical damage dealers to take her down.
soft: Armor/magic defense penetration artifact – once his armor or magic defense is lowered she goes down really fast. Combine skills and attacks together to melt her down in a few seconds.
